content: प्रसंज् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> To become attached to or fond of, feel affection for. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cling to or adhere to. {@--2@} To follow, apply or be applicable, hold good in the case of (active also in this sense); इतरेतराश्रयः प्रसज्येत, वैषम्यनैर्घृण्ये नेश्वरस्य प्रसज्येते <ls>Ś. B.</ls> {@--3@} To be attached to; तस्यामसौ प्रासजत् <ls>Dk.</ls>
